website_summaries.verdict: This is an affordable option that really works for those looking to rid their eyes of redness.
pros: Works quickly to alleviate red eyes from allergies, tiredness, overuse, and other causes
Bottles are small and discreet to use at home or on-the-go
Doubles as an eye moisturizer in addition to ridding eyes of redness
cons: It typically takes 2 or more drops to see real results

customer_reviews.title: Beauty secret
customer_reviews.text: I use this for any redness on my face. I have a big scar on my cheek that gets very red where the dermabrasion made blood vessels come to the surface. Before applying makeup I spread a few drops on the scar and on acne spots, and all the redness goes away. Also great around eyes and nose. If it's safe enough for my eyes, it's safe for my skin. I've been using it for years. This is the best of the redness relief products, and amazon offers the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexasmaster

customer_reviews.title: Soon to expire
customer_reviews.text: Good morning. I've just noticed that this product will expire in April 2019, how is possible to buy this stuff in January this year and is about to expire, in April this year....normally this kind of products have an expiration date of at least 1 year, cause this is not the first time i buy eyedrops....in this order i bought 3 pieces, i'm currently using one, the other two i'm gonna have to throw them away...this sale is a hoax.
customer_reviews.author: cristian d.

customer_reviews.title: Works except for the redness part
customer_reviews.text: This works as well as any halfway decent eye solution as far as easing the dryness and flushing stuff out. It did zero as far as clearing out the red-eye. Maybe I got spoiled to that crazy expensive Lumify, bu t this didn't do one thing to brighten my eyes. I have mostly used the cheapest of cheap Walmart brand of artificial tear and that works great for dry eye/flushing and, like this, nothing for the red. I will just use this supply up and not get any more. I thought that it would at least help somewhat with easing the red eye. Oh well. At least it was fairly cheap and does the rest of what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: TM Conway

customer_reviews.title: The Best Clear eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic dry eye so my eyes are blood shot randomly though out the day. This seems to be the only formula that will knock the red out. I love it and always carry a bottle with me.
customer_reviews.author: J.N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a bit, but red eyes kept coming back.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my eyes recently started to be red - all the time. It was getting really annoying, especially at work, so I tried this. It would kinda work, after I put the drops in parts of my eyes would not be red, but the redness would always return. So I'd put in more drops, same thing, over the course of the day. For whatever reason my eyes are doing this, this product did not fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Clear Eyes is a life saver when traveling!!!  5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Clear Eyes works great for my dry eyes!! I travel often and love to bring this with me on the airplane due to the air being so dry. Two drops in each eye is all it takes to bring my eyes back to life. Clear Eyes is a life saver!! Its also great to have this with you at anytime when you are out and about and you have an itchy or scratchy eye!!! This product is a MUST!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not new - Box was opened
customer_reviews.text: The outside bag was sealed but one of the 3 boxes had obviously been tampered with. It was broken and so I had to toss it. Couldn’t return it since I checked the bag past the 30 days mark. I haven’t tried them to see if they work or not but the fact that one of them was not new is highly disappointed and possibly dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Ever notice that old people almost always have red eyes ...
customer_reviews.text: Ever notice that old people almost always have red eyes and it makes them look old . well I use CLEAR EYES all the time I have not heard anybody say " boy look how red his eyes are ....he looks old. ( and i am 78),....lol.... Also I am a wood carver and sometimes i cut myself with my sharp knife and this stuff, when poured on the cut stops the bleeding .My Dr. came into the room and he had a paper cut and it would not stop bleeding so I told him to put clear eyes on the cut....he did and it stopped bleeding. He said I sure never learned that in med. school.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Quilici

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen the mixed reviews on this product so I was a little scared when I ordered it. However, I’m so happy I did!! All three came fully sealed and full of product, no sign of previous use or damage. They expire 05/21, none came expired. The bottles are huge too! I also struggle with chronic dry eyes and this stuff soothes them instantly. Immediately and effectively reduces redness too. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for soothing dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: From my wife: I have issues with dry eyes and contacts. Since using these eye drops about 5 minutes before putting in contacts each morning and after taking them out each night, my eyes have been much happier. I highly recommend trying these eye drops if you wear contacts and have issues with dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Red eyes be gone!!
customer_reviews.text: Bueller...Bueller...Bueller...Bueller? Some will get it most probably will not, but if you did...man yall cool as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Pete wilson

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Use If You Have Dry Eye Syndrome
customer_reviews.text: While Visene works for some, those with sensitive eyes or dry eye syndrome should not use this, as it contains preservatives (hence why you feel the need to use them every few hours). Unfortunately, if your eyes get extra dry in the winter like mine, you'll have to pay a little more and get ones without preservatives. I recommend TheraTears Dry Eye Therapy. You won't need to use them nearly as often and they help rebuild your lipid layers to produce more natural tears.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: This is the only brand that works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other red eye relief brands over the years and Clear Eyes is the only one that actually works for me. Others would work for a hour but after that my eyes would be extremely red. Using more would not clear them. That never happens with Clear Eyes.
customer_reviews.author: MLSabo

customer_reviews.title: use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: I have to use this eye drops, because my eyes get irritation from computer screen and even sleeping late, my eyes clear out and they soothe well. It was greatly priced as it was packaged as a set.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. I have allergies/eczema that cause my right eye to puff up and make my eye water. A drop or two of this helps relieve the itchiness and watering. They don't cause burning and I have no negative side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Clear those eyes
customer_reviews.text: Mannnnnnn, I can’t tell you how invaluable these things are. I have one with me, one in my bag, two at home, and one in the car, and lemme tell ya, I NEVER worry about my eyes. This clears up anything and everything. Plus I use it when I’m using contacts and my eyes get dry/itchy. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.text: I once went to a party where i received the feedback that my eyes were as red as the devils genitalia. These drops brought me back to the light! Dont sleep on clear eyes fam...

They're simply not really that effective at reducing redness. I'd prefer Rohto Ice eyedrops to these any day (I've purchased those from Walmart before and they work very well (and super quickly).

product_meta.title: Clear Eyes | Maximum Redness Relief Eye Drops | 0.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Style:0.5 oz| Size:0.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 3)A convenient 3 pack of the top selling eye drop formula from Clear Eyes, the #1 brand of redness relief eye drop. Relieves redness and also contains an active lubricant to moisturize and relief your dry, irritated and burning eyes.
feature_bullets: Clear Eyes Maximum Redness Relief Eye Drops provide maximum strength redness relief without a prescription
Relieves red eyes, plus relieves dryness, burning, and other irritations
From the #1 selling brand of eye drops
Provides up to 12 hours of soothing comfort; Pack of 3

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
